panels.description: Number of active meetings currently hosted by this Meeting Controller instance.
panels.title: Active Meetings

panels.description: Number of active WebTransport connections to this Meeting Controller.
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Service health status. 1 = up, 0 = down. Monitors whether MC pods are running and responding to probes.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Total actor panics since service start. Any panic is a critical issue requiring investigation.
panels.title: Actor Panics (Total)

panels.description: Message drop rate as percentage of total messages. Red = >1% (SLO violation).
panels.title: Message Drop Rate (%)

panels.description: Number of running MC pods. Monitors pod availability and scaling.
panels.title: Pod Count

panels.description: Actor mailbox depth by actor type. High depth indicates backpressure or slow processing. Warning at 100, critical at 500.
panels.title: Actor Mailbox Depth by Type

panels.description: Message processing latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99) with SLO threshold line at 500ms. Violations indicate latency SLO breach.
panels.title: Message Processing Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Message drop rate by actor type (messages per second). Any dropped messages indicate capacity issues or backpressure.
panels.title: Messages Dropped by Actor Type

panels.description: Actor panic rate by actor type. Any panic is a critical issue. Usually indicates a bug in message handling.
panels.title: Actor Panics by Type

panels.description: Active meetings and connections over time. Shows capacity utilization and load patterns.
panels.title: Active Meetings & Connections Over Time

panels.description: Message processing throughput (messages per second) by actor type. Shows actor workload distribution.
panels.title: Message Processing Throughput by Actor Type

panels.description: Memory usage across MC pods. Monitors memory consumption and potential leaks.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage across MC pods. Monitors CPU consumption and load patterns.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: GC registration and heartbeat status. Shows MC registration with Global Controller health.
panels.title: GC Heartbeat Status

panels.description: Token refresh rate by status. Tracks OAuth token refresh success/failure against AC.
panels.title: Token Refresh Rate by Status

panels.description: Token refresh latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99). Monitors AC token acquisition performance.
panels.title: Token Refresh Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: GC heartbeat latency percentiles by type (fast/comprehensive). SLO target: p99 < 100ms.
panels.title: GC Heartbeat Latency (P99 by Type)

panels.description: Redis operation latency percentiles by operation type. SLO target: p99 < 10ms.
panels.title: Redis Latency (P99 by Operation)

panels.description: Redis operation latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99). SLO target: p99 < 10ms.
panels.title: Redis Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Session recovery duration percentiles (p50, p95, p99). SLO target: p99 < 500ms.
panels.title: Recovery Duration (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Fenced-out events by reason. Non-zero values indicate split-brain scenarios. Investigate if rate > 0.1/min.
panels.title: Fenced-Out Events by Reason

panels.description: GC heartbeat latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99). SLO target: p99 < 100ms.
panels.title: GC Heartbeat Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Error rate by operation label. Tracks all MC errors across subsystems (token_refresh, gc_heartbeat, redis_session, etc.).
panels.title: Errors by Operation & Type

panels.description: Token refresh failure rate by reason (error_type). High rate indicates AC connectivity issues.
panels.title: Token Refresh Failures by Type
